pma:database.name: phpmy1_pizarronesguadalajara_com
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `detalle_ventas` ( `iddetalle_ventas` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `idventa` int(11) NOT NULL, `idprod` int(11) NOT NULL, `precio` decimal(11,2) NOT NULL, `cantidad` int(11) NOT NULL, `subtotal` decimal(11,2) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`iddetalle_ventas`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_spanish2_ci;
